筒.definition: tube; cylinder; to encase in sth cylindrical (such as hands in sleeves etc)

筒子.definition: tube-shaped object; tube; bobbin; (Internet slang) homonym for 同志[tong2 zhi4]

筒子米糕.definition: rice tube pudding, a single-serve column of glutinous rice topped with a sauce and garnished (Taiwanese dish, originally prepared by stuffing rice into bamboo tubes and steaming them)
